sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
A persvvassion to loyalty, or, The subject's dutie vvherein is proved that resisting or deposing of kings (under what spccious [sic] pretences soever couched) is utterly unlawfull / collected by D.O. Herod and Pilate reconciled Owen, David, d. 1623.
[6], 30 p.
[s.n.], London printed : 1642.
A reprint of the original manuscript entitled: The power of princes and the duty of subjects. Cf. DNB. Reproduction of original in Bristol Public Library.
=======
